its…

ine 19: [Error] (14469:7): Unknown identifier ‘invincount’ in script

but i dont see how thats wrong coz it works perfect in another script ive seen :S

[/quote]

same here any ideas?[/quote]

Download the latest SRL/use a more up-to-date script.

item.dc:creator: @fooktard fooktard
item.description:
@fooktard wrote:

@ m0u53m4t i fixed that that was a stupid error by me.

fixed the majority just working thru bugs, like the bug were it right clicks the bone but wont click “Take Bones” >.<
anyone no how 2 fix? the text im using for taking the bones is…

WriteLn('clicking bones'); ClickMSColor(bonecolour,false); wait(500) chooseoption(x,y,'Take Bones');

it just wont seem to click take bones =.=[br][size=1]Posted at: August 20, 2006, 07:15:04 PM[/size][hr]fixed it, works great

item.title: My bone burrier, almost done, need help with some errors
item.dc:creator: @fooktard fooktard
item.description:
@fooktard wrote:

hey my bone burrier is almost done, can someone help me fix these few errors?

the errors are…

Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.02\includes\SRL\SRL.scar does not exist. Failed when compiling Line 15: [Error] (15:1): Unknown identifier 'ClickMMColor' in script C:\Documents and Settings\Compaq_Owner\Desktop\myfristboneburrier.scar

here is the script

[code]/////garys bonepicker and burrier
///// Jagex banned my main, this is my fuck you to them

Program setup;
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}

const
bonecolour = 12500678; //colour of the bones 2 pick

procedure bonepicker;
begin
wait(1000)
WriteLn(‘clicking bones’);
wait(500)
ClickMMColor(bonecolour);
wait(2000+random(1000));
repeat
wait(500)
until(invincount=28)then
end;

procedure bury;
WriteLn(‘burying the bones’);
ClickAllItemsColor(‘bury’,bonecolour);
end;

begin
repeat
bonepicker;
bury;
until(false)
end.[/code]

help would be greatly apreciated.

gary.

Read full topic
item.source: My bone burrier, almost done, need help with some errors
